name: v2.1.0
body:
Release 2.1.0

**Enhancements**
- Added pre-rendered tooltip previews for built-in materials.
- Shortcuts are now viewable in the tile editor.
- Added option to view camera numbers.
- Added camera multiselect.
- Added option to change which layers prop selection chooses from.
- Warped prop textures are now warped correctly.
- Updated Drizzle to v0.2.0.11
- Added option to use the old control for prop creation.
- Added "Maroon" theme. (Fun Fact: it's from Soundbox, one of my other projects.)
- Decreased CPU usage while program is unused.
  - More specifically, the program stops processing until user input is received after a short period of user inactivity. Certain scenarios have exceptions.

**Fixes**
- Fixed crash occuring when loading large tile textures.
- Fixed the "unknown texture" texture.
- Direct3D shader compatibility fix.
- Now correctly registers skipped palette entries for custom palettes added to `assets/palettes`.
  - On that note, I also added the MSC palettes.
- Fixed visual bug in regards to incorrectly determined stray tile fragments.
- Fixed mirroring while erasing in the geometry editor.

No fix for the still occuring problem of Rained not launching due to stupid graphics libraries not working. Found a fix for it (i.e. switching to a different library that I confirmed worked with a "victim"). But it will take a while. Despite it only happening to a few people, it still bugs me (unintended pun). I am starting to regret programming this in C# .NET Core.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/pkhead/rained/compare/v2.0.4...v2.1.0

name: v2.0.4
body:
Release 2.0.4

- Fixed graphics driver incompatibilities.
- Added support for rendering using Direct3D and Vulkan.
- Added vsync and refresh rate options.
- Improved font rendering.
- Fixed level resizing creating stray tile fragments.
- Less laggy render preview.
- Improved tile rendering.
- Fixed tile removal removing the material under it.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/pkhead/rained/compare/v2.0.3...v2.0.4

name: v2.0.3
body:
Release 2.0.3

- Might have fixed the "Framebuffer not complete" exception that occurs with some graphics drivers. Apparently, whatever I did with the code since v2.0.2 fixed the issue on someone's computer, so I'm making a new release with the changes.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/pkhead/rained/compare/v2.0.2...v2.0.3

name: v2.0.2
body:
Release 2.0.2

- Fixed one OpenGL compatibility issue.
- Fixed chain holder saving/loading
- Minor change in Rained's logging functionalities

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/pkhead/rained/compare/v2.0.1...v2.0.2

name: v2.0.1
body:
Release 2.0.1

- Fixed Linux build
- Updated documentation
- Added user guide

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/pkhead/rained/compare/v2.0.0...v2.0.1

name: v2.0.0
body:
Release 2.0.0

Props
- Removed sublayer slider in props editor.
- Newly placed props will copy the depth offsets of the props selected at the time of placement.
- Added vertex snapping mode for prop vertex transformations.
- Switched prop editor mouse controls: right click now adds a prop and double-click opens a selection list.
- Palette preview now applies to all prop types.

Geometry
- Added mirroring functionality.
- Rect slope fill.
- Wall and air flood fill.
- Batfly hives can now be placed on background layers.

General editing
- Added the ability to set a camera to render first.
- Hovering over a tile, material, or prop now shows the name of the asset in the status bar.
- Changed tile spec colors.
  - They are also now configurable from the preferences window.

Other
- Emergency save system in case of application crash.
- Rained now scales the UI for different pixel ratios/DPIs.
  - Configurable scale/fonts.
- Added Drizzle render configuration (editorConfig.txt) in the preferences window.
- Optimized grid rendering.
- Removed "Reset View" button from status bar.
- Changed backends, from Raylib to a custom OpenGL wrapper over Silk.NET
- Bug fixes and other minor improvements

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/pkhead/rained/compare/b1.5.3...v2.0.0

name: b1.5.3
body:
Beta 1.5.3

- Added preview in level browser
- Some new themes
- Fixed loading of some vanilla levels
- Fixed some effects having an incorrect default layer
- Added sublayer slider in props editor

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/pkhead/rained/compare/b1.5.2...b1.5.3

name: b1.5.2
body:
Beta 1.5.2

- Fixed Cacti effect

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/pkhead/rained/compare/b1.5.1...b1.5.2

name: b1.5.1
body:
Beta 1.5.1

- Fixed tile/material rect fill bugs
- Acknowledge "randomFlipX", "randomFlipY", and "randomRotat" prop tags

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/pkhead/rained/compare/b1.5.0...b1.5.1

name: b1.5.0
body:
Beta 1.5.0

- Added tile graphics rendering with or without a palette
- Optimized tile preview rendering
- Can remove materials in tile mode and vice versa
- Added tile/material rect fill/remove

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/pkhead/rained/compare/b1.4.4...b1.5.0

name: b1.4.4
body:
Beta 1.4.4

- Added view tiles/props toggle for all edit modes
- Added shortcuts for toggling level view elements
- Improved geo editor visuals

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/pkhead/rained/compare/b1.4.3...b1.4.4

name: b1.4.3
body:
Beta 1.4.3

- Fixed the "Erode" effect missing the layer setting
- Can now parse inits that use string concatenation (e.g. Trans Flag)

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/pkhead/rained/compare/b1.4.2...b1.4.3

name: b1.4.2
body:
Beta 1.4.2

- Added update checker
- Fixed bug that would occur when using the effect editor move buttons
- Fixed empty items being added to the recent files list
- Removed brush size edit menu buttons
- Changed setup screen
- Rewrote some code

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/pkhead/rained/compare/b1.4.1...b1.4.2

name: b1.4.1
body:
Beta 1.4.1

- Fixed bugs relating to object placement/removal in the geometry editor
- Added autotile mouse mode option in the preferences window
  - Autotile mouse mode defaults to "Hold", whereas in b1.4.0 it used the "Click" mode.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/pkhead/rained/compare/b1.4.0...b1.4.1

name: b1.4.0
body:
Beta 1.4.0

- Native Linux build
- Updated Drizzle to 0.2.0.10
- Faster boot; tile graphics are loaded as needed rather than all at once.
- Autotiling system
- Lua scripting system
- Edit menu buttons for actions specific to the current edit mode
- "Create Folder" button in file browser
- No longer silently saves file when a render starts
- Added Chain Holder's special chain attach
- Auto-crops asset graphics for parity with the official level editor

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/pkhead/rained/compare/b1.3.6...b1.4.0

name: b1.3.6
body:
Beta 1.3.6

- Fix possible number parsing problems when reading level or asset init files.
- Will ignore "malformed" category headers when reading asset init files. This means Solar's repo will work now.
- Will show a placeholder texture for missing asset textures.
- Will display a placeholder graphic for detached tile bodies.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/pkhead/rained/compare/b1.3.5...b1.3.6

name: b1.3.5
body:
Beta 1.3.5
- Added an app icon, created by me and @quivel
- Removing a detached tile body now erases the cell instead of crashing Rained
- Fixed potential crash when setting a new data directory in the asset manager

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/pkhead/rained/compare/b1.3.4...b1.3.5

name: b1.3.4
body:
Beta 1.3.4
- Added Windows console executable
- Recognize files named "Copy to Init.txt" in the asset manager
- Fixed Drought long and rope props

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/pkhead/rained/compare/b1.3.3...b1.3.4

name: b1.3.3
body:
Beta 1.3.3

- Fixed possible crash in the geometry editor when alt+tabbing
- Right-click to remove objects in the geometry editor
- Fixed incorrect keyboard shortcuts
- Configurable camera border view mode
- Will no longer select props that are behind the view layer

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/pkhead/rained/compare/b1.3.2...b1.3.3

name: b1.3.2
body:
Beta 1.3.2
- Added zoom and brush size keybinds
- Added rebindable "Right Mouse Substitute" keybind

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/pkhead/rained/compare/b1.3.1...b1.3.2

name: b1.3.1
body:
Beta 1.3.1

- Drizzle cast data is kept internally; the configured data path no longer requires a cast directory.
- Removed camera limit
- Rect fill in geo editor now shows the rectangle size
- Fixed asset manager crash when deleting something in an empty list
- Fixed file browser crash in app setup
- Support for loading deprecated effects (Slag, Corruption No Eye, Sand, Scales, Restore as Pipes)

## New Contributors
* @LudoCrypt made their first contribution in https://github.com/pkhead/rained/pull/3

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/pkhead/rained/compare/b1.3.0...b1.3.1

name: b1.3.0
body:
Beta 1.3.0

This is a big one...
- Added a preferences window (File > Preferences)
- Changed default camera/prop/effects delete shortcut from Backspace/Delete to X
- Custom themes
- Shortcuts are now rebindable
- Option to view camera borders from any edit mode
- Customizable level colors
- Add ability to change Drizzle data directory
- Asset manager and init importer
- Optional Zygote runtime pre-loading
- Fixed incorrect tile category colors
- Add copy backwards tool
- Show list of unrecognized assets when the level failed to load
- Make render preview optional
- View prop and light render previews
- Fix BlackGoo preview in effects render preview
- Data configuration screen on first-time startup
**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/pkhead/rained/compare/b1.2.2...b1.3.0

Note that the release package no longer contains a Data folder. You will be able to configure one or download it from the app on a first-time startup.

name: b1.2.2
body:
Beta 1.2.2

- Fixed visual snapping issue on the camera angle gizmo
- Fixed wire props not rendering
- Fixed not saving or loading rope thickness

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/pkhead/rained/compare/b1.2.1...b1.2.2

name: b1.2.1
body:
Beta 1.2.1

- Fix light map saving/loading inaccuracy
- Include `Data/LevelEditorProjects/00_GATE` and `Data/LevelEditorProjects/templates` folders in release zip

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/pkhead/rained/compare/b1.2.0...b1.2.1

name: b1.2.0
body:
Beta 1.2.0

- Added category colors
- Swap Q and E keybinds in the tile editor to match the keybinds of the original level editor
- Add more community editor tiles
- Fixed bug where Rained doesn't remember the path to the level when opened with a file
- Fixed bug where props could be selected more than once with box select

I think I regret choosing a semantic versioning scheme for these beta builds.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/pkhead/rained/compare/b1.1.7...b1.2.0

name: b1.1.7
body:
Beta 1.1.7

- Fixed crash that occurs when rendering a level whose folder path no longer exists
- Shortcut window now automatically switches window when already in the selected editor
(still a bit clunky, ug...)
- Also fixed swapped X/Y snapping controls

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/pkhead/rained/compare/b1.1.6...b1.1.7

name: b1.1.6
body:
Beta 1.1.6

- Added camera snapping
- Added long props
- "Freeform Warp" text in the prop editor now says "Vertex Mode"
- Minor level resize improvements
- Added `--help` and `--version` flags to command-line interface (that doesn't print anything on Windows anyway...)

Please ignore the fact that the shortcuts window swaps the keys for the X and Y snapping controls. My Wi-Fi is being slow right now so it takes like 10 mins to upload another zip.

name: b1.1.5
body:
Beta 1.1.5

- Fixed geo editor crash pertaining to undo/redo
- Minor improvements

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/pkhead/rained/compare/b1.1.4...b1.1.5

name: b1.1.4
body:
Beta 1.1.4

- Fix locale file reading issue
- Add tile head view toggle
- Fix lag issue with some GPUs when zooming in with the grid enabled (now, it lags when you zoom out!)
- Hold R while placing/removing materials to disallow material overwrite
- Tiles no longer place over the previously placed tile when forced on the same mouse stroke
- Fix bug which loaded flipped rectangular props incorrectly

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/pkhead/rained/compare/b1.1.3...b1.1.4

name: b1.1.3
body:
Beta 1.1.3

- Fix sometimes not being able to select a prop when searched
- Update release readme
- That is all because I'm very good at testing my code before releasing the previous version

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/pkhead/rained/compare/b1.1.2...b1.1.3
